Overseas Koreans' Delegations and Delegate Here
   Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Tae Sik, vice-chairman of the Korean Medical Association in Japan, a delegation of Korean medical workers in the U.S. led by Yoon Berm Kim, professor emeritus of Chicago Medical School, and a delegation of south Korean medical workers led by Joon Young Park, chancellor of Eulji University, arrived here Tuesday to participate in the 9th Pyongyang Symposium on Medical Science of compatriots from home and abroad.
